voice: I will work if we belong.
keynotes: Emotional warmth and touch (37) meets willpower to work/provide (40).
Core tribal bargain: I give work → I get family/belonging.
Sets terms for community, clan, crew, household.
Runs on emotional waves → clarity is not in the now.
40 must actually have the will before it promises.
37 wants fairness, food, touch, and a place at the table.
Healthy: loyal, generous, protective, clear about deals.
Shadow: guilt, emotional blackmail, ‘after all I’ve done for you.’
notes:
37–40 is the classic **Channel of Community** in the Tribal Defense circuit. **Gate 37** in the Solar Plexus brings emotional warmth, touch, friendliness, and the desire for a fair, human deal. **Gate 40** in the Ego/Heart brings the will to work, to provide, to go off alone and ‘do the job’ for the tribe. Together they form the **bargain of belonging**: *I will work for you / protect us (40) if I am fed, touched, included, and treated fairly (37).* 

Because 37 is emotional, this channel should **wait for emotional clarity** before making or changing agreements. When clean, it creates the healthiest form of tribe/family/community — everyone knows the terms and everyone is cared for. When distorted, it becomes the classic tribal guilt pattern: “Look at everything I did for you,” or, from 37’s side, “If you loved me, you’d do X.” 

Use it in your dataset anywhere you need to model **mutual obligation, hospitality, clan membership, and emotional economics.**
